comment.author: 51831264@N04
comment._content: A product manufactured by the Company was widely used in the dairy industry in Australia. The product carried the brand name Unicod and it was a sweet, cod liver oil that was available in Australia and New Zealand. The Company was based in Sydney and Melbourne in Australia and Wellington in New Zealand (in 1935). A trade advertisement for the product in the Agricultural Gazette of N.S.W. is available here: picasaweb.google.com/101111009400832566646/TradeAdvertise...
